_comment2: Rename this file to config.json and adjust the values to your setup.
_comment_server_port: The port on which the TS6 Viewer web interface will be available.
_comment_theme: Choose between 'light' or 'dark' for the viewer theme.
_comment_refresh_interval: How often the viewer should auto-refresh (in seconds).
_comment_host_connection_link: The URL or IP address of your TeamSpeak 6 server. This is used for display purposes and should match the actual server address.

teamspeak6._comment_host: The ServerQuery [ssh] host. Usually the IP / domain of your TeamSpeak 6 server or 'localhost' if TS6 Viewer runs on the same machine.
teamspeak6._comment_port: The ServerQuery [ssh] port. Usually 10022 for SSH.
teamspeak6._comment_user: The ServerQuery [ssh] user. Usually 'serveradmin' by default.
teamspeak6._comment_password: The ServerQuery [ssh] password. It is shown ONCE in the server logs on first startup.
teamspeak6._comment_enable_voice_status: Fetch microphone and audio output status for each client (TS6 -voice).
teamspeak6._comment_server_id: The ID of the virtual server you want to display. Default is usually '1'.
